Title: Paranormal Activity 2
Writer: Michael R. Perry (screenplay), Christopher Landon (screenplay), Tom Pabst (screenplay), Michael R. Perry (story), Oren Peli (film "Paranormal Activity")
Actors: David Bierend, Brian Boland, Molly Ephraim, Katie Featherston
Plot: After experiencing what they think are a series of "break-ins", a family sets up security cameras around their home, only to realize that the events unfolding before them are more sinister than they seem.
